HediffDef.description: An improvement over the bionic Power Claw, these claws have been vat-grown with a mixture of human and bear DNA, and replace the subject's hand with versatile, non-retractable claws.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: bear claws

HediffDef.description: Grotesque but powerful hand blades that have been modified to be used in mining operations, increasing both speed and yield.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: digging bear claws

HediffDef.description: Grafts of bear muscle tissue on the subject's torso increase overall strength and stamina. These grafts however tend to stimulate the production of an abundance of body hair.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: bear muscle tissue

HediffDef.description: A biochip that modifies the brain to reduce the need for sleep.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: hibernation module

HediffDef.description: You know you have gone too far in your scientific experiments when you are implanting a human being with an ovipositor. This will enable the colonist to lay chicken eggs twice a day. It hurts as hell, though. Also, yuck.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: ovipositor

HediffDef.description: By implanting muffalo mammaries into a colonist... Wait, what??? Who came up with this idea????? Anyway... this implant allows your colonist to be milked... Ugh, I give up.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: muffalo mammaries

HediffDef.description: By weaving muffalo muscle strands with the subjects muscular system, strength, resilience and carrying capacity are greatly increased.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: muffalo strengthened muscles

HediffDef.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to low temperatures.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: muffalo skin

HediffDef.description: These skin nodules can be integrated in a human's torso, causing a huge explosion if the subjects dies violently.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: boomalope nodules

HediffDef.description: A reinforced bionic stomach that uses a combination of gastric acid and chemfuel to efficiently digest food.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: chemfuel stomach

HediffDef.description: A reinforced bionic heart that acts like a miniature 4-stroke internal combustion engine powered by chemfuel to pump blood through the body.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: chemfuel heart

HediffDef.description: The subjects legs can be modified by weaving hybrid human/wolf muscle fibers within the base tissue, giving her a significant strength and speed boost.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: wolf muscular fibers

HediffDef.description: A set of improved teeth designed to rapidly chew and ingest any kind of food. Leaves kind of a mess, though...
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: devouring jaws

HediffDef.description: A biochip using animal stem cells to reinforce the natural abilities of human neurons, increasing learning and research speed.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: neuron reinforcement

HediffDef.description: A bionic vomeronasal organ that allows the subject pheromonal communication with other animals, increasing the chance of taming and training them successfully.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: mouse pheromones

HediffDef.description: A biochip that reduces pain sensitivity, allowing the subject to survive pain shock.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: mole-rat nerve dampener

HediffDef.description: This huge leporid ear gives amazing enhanced hearing. Also, super kawaii!
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: bunny ear

HediffDef.description: These hybrid humanoid / insectoid feeling appendages can be implanted in a subject's head, completely modifying the way the subject "sees" and feels the surrounding world. The experience may be slightly overwhelming due to sensorial overload.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: insectoid antennae

HediffDef.description: This hybrid humanoid / insectoid eye provides improved vision in a wide range of different wavelengths, including those usually outside the human range, completely modifying the way the subject perceives his surroundings.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: compound insectoid eye

HediffDef.description: Artificial hearing aids that block psychic emanations, providing considerable resistance to mechanoids' psychic attacks.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: psychic dampeners

HediffDef.description: This is a bioelectronic kidney prosthesis that greatly improves the efficiency of the subject's kidney by using insectoid tissue, providing resistence to toxic substances.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: kidney toxic filters

HediffDef.description: A genetically modified thrumbo horn that can be implanted in a subject's forehead. Nasty.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: thrumbo horn

HediffDef.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a lot of defense and makes the subject more resistant to extremes of temperature.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: thrumbo skin

HediffDef.description: This hybrid implant substitutes the subject's jaw with a set of venomous fangs. Useful in combat, but not very comfortable.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: venomous fangs

HediffDef.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to high temperatures.
HediffDef.label: humanoid implant: iguana scales
